  SET status = 3
  WHERE problem_id = {{ Table1.triggeredRow.problem_id }};

value({{Table1.triggeredRow.problem_id}},{{Table1.triggeredRow.accepted_by}},{{moment().format("YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss")}},1)
